scenario_text.value: Oh, it’s Floramon!
Saki! I finally found you!
Uh, yeah... You ARE Floramon, aren’t you?
What an awful thing to say!

Do you have any idea how much I suffered
after getting separated from you?!
Oh, I, I’m sorry...

Ahh, how could you know... This is you we’re
talking about here.
What?

You don’t give a crap about anything or
anybody else. You just do whatever you want.

Do you really think I’d get along with a kid
like that? Perish the thought!
*sob*

You’re always acting like you’re the center
of the universe! That’s why people hate you!
No... Stop...

Don’t you think it’s time you recognized it?
There isn’t a person alive that likes you.
That’s enough out of you!
Excuse me...?

Saki’s self-centered? She doesn’t care about
others? That’s just your biased opinion!

Saki isn’t selfish, just straightforward! She
never lies to herself!

I like Saki way more than someone like you
who pretends to be something they’re not!
Aoi...
Hmph...
The fake Floramon ran away.
Aoi, oh, Aoi... *sniff* I, I...
Yes, I understand. Just take your time.

(Aoi and Saki really are close now. Traps
like this are nothing with those two around.)
